messages.content: Where was André Oriani born?
André Oriani was born in Piracicaba, Sao Paulo, Brazil.
In which city was André Oriani born?
He was born in the city of Piracicaba.
Where does André Oriani currently reside?
André Oriani currently lives in San Bruno, California, United States.
In which city does André Oriani live now?
André Oriani lives in San Bruno, California, United States.
Who is André Oriani?
André Oriani is a software engineer at Walmart in San Bruno.
What is André Oriani's profession?
André Oriani is a software engineer.
When did André Oriani move to a new country?
André Oriani moved to a new country in 2014.
How many times has André Oriani moved to a different country?
André Oriani has moved to a new country only once.
What other citizenship does André Oriani hold besides his primary one?
André Oriani is also an Italian citizen.
Is André Oriani an Italian citizen?
Yes, André Oriani is an Italian citizen.
What does André Oriani enjoy doing in his leisure time?
In his leisure time, André Oriani enjoys riding his bicycle in the Bay Area.
Where does André Oriani like to cycle in his free time?
André Oriani likes to cycle in the Bay Area during his free time.
Which countries has André Oriani visited?
André Oriani has visited Italy, Germany, France, England, and Japan.
Can you list the countries André Oriani has traveled to?
André Oriani has traveled to Italy, Germany, France, England, and Japan.
What does André Oriani do for a living?
André Oriani develops Android apps for a living.
Who is André Oriani and what is his profession?
André Oriani is a professional who develops Android apps.
Where does tapioca originally come from?
Tapioca is originally from Brazil.
Can you tell me the country of origin for tapioca?
Tapioca originates from Brazil.
Does André Oriani know how to swim?
No, André Oriani does not know how to swim.
Can André Oriani swim?
André Oriani cannot swim.
